text: Viktor Imantovich Alksnis (21 June 1950 â€“ 1 January 2025) was a Russian politician. From 2000 to 2007, he was a member of the State Duma. He was the Mayor of Tuchkovo from 2013 to 2015. Alksnis died on 1 January 2025, at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1950 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Russian politicians Category:Mayors
title: Viktor Alksnis
